long_description: nicehash is a global cryptocurrency hash power broker and cryptocurrency exchange with an open marketplace that connects sellers of hashing power (cryptominers) with buyers of hashing power using the sharing economy approach. the company provides software for cryptocurrency mining. the company was founded in 2014 by two slovenian university students, marko kobal and matjaž škorjanc. the company is based in the british virgin islands and has offices in maribor, slovenia. nicehash users are primarily video gamers who have powerful graphics cards (gpus) suited to cryptocurrency mining. the company has over 2.5 million users in 190 countries worldwide as of november 2021.
